about_the_game:
After inheriting a strange mansion from your father, you stumble upon an ancient book and accidentally summon a mischievous femboy ghost. Now bound to your home, the ghost becomes your roommate, and it's up to you to reveal the secrets of the mansion and book while navigating your unusual new life together.

Can you uncover the house's secrets and learn to peacefully co-exist with your charming, otherworldly companion?

You can expect:

- Multiple endings based on decisions made during the game.

- A semi-sandbox system where you can choose how to interact with your spooky roommate, with new options and interactions opening up as your relationship changes.

- Collectibles and achievements.

- A full replay gallery where you can revisit scenes, or see which scenes you haven't unlocked yet.

- And much, much more.

content_descriptors.notes:
- Revealing outfits, sexual language and adult situations
- Various Sex Scenes (Blowjobs, consensual sex, masturbation, kissing, gay sex.)
- Crossdressing
- All characters in "Haunted by Femboy" are 18+ and over

Minimum:

  • Processor: 1 Ghz
